projectGridLines.title: Operations Management for the Darjeeling Revival Project
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Day-to-day operations for the Enhanced Rock Weathering project being

undertaken in the tea estates of Darjeeling

? Engage in resource management and oversee sample analysis timelines

? Coordinate logistics, conference planning, and event management

? Handle vendor onboarding and manage budgeting

Skill sets: Experience in managing college fests, Part of organising/finance committee

Traits expectation: Strong organizational and communication skills, Detail oriented,

Proactive learners and problem solvers

Expected learning:Operations and logistics management within a fast-paced, innovation

heavy work environment

Development of leadership skills through direct engagement with ground operations

Experience in setting up processes, project and event management

projectGridLines.title: Strategic partnerships for Carbon Dioxide Removal (CDR) projects
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

? Support the development and management of sales pipelines.

? Conduct market research and contribute to sales strategies.

? Create and refine pitch decks for potential partners and stakeholders.

? Assist in managing relationships with key stakeholders.

Skill sets: Candidates with excellent analytical, research and presentation skills.

Traits expectation: Interest in business, marketing, or related fields.

Team players with a keen interest in sustainability and sales.

Expected learning: Enhanced skills in creating and managing strategic business

relationships.

Proficiency in market analysis and its application in sales strategies.
